languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс застывает.{/n} "Нет. Нет, мне не доставило это ни довольства, ни радости. Я... поступил как должно агенту Золотого Трона, на пути которого появилась преграда. Я поступил как Калькасар. Я не горжусь этим".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс застывает. Потом опускает взгляд.{/n} "Нет. Нет, мне не доставило это ни довольства, ни радости. Я... поступил как должно агенту Золотого Трона, на пути которого появилась преграда. Я поступил как Калькасар. Я не горжусь этим".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix stiffens.{/n} "No. No, I took no pleasure or joy in it. I... acted as any agent of the Golden Throne should when faced with an obstacle in his path. I acted like Calcazar. I'm not proud of it."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс застывает.{/n} "Нет. Нет, мне не доставило это ни довольства, ни радости. Я... поступил как должно агенту Золотого Трона, на пути которого появилась преграда. Я поступил как Калькасар. Я не горжусь этим".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix stiffens.{/n} "No. No, I took no pleasure or joy in it. I... acted as any agent of the Golden Throne should when faced with an obstacle in his path. I acted like Calcazar. I'm not proud of it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix stiffens.{/n} "No. No, I took no pleasure or joy in it. I... acted as any agent of the Golden Throne should when faced with an obstacle in his path. I acted like Calcazar. I'm not proud of it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix stiffens.{/n} "No. No, I took no pleasure or joy in it. I... acted as any agent of the Golden Throne should when faced with an obstacle in his path. I acted like Calcazar. I'm not proud of it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix stiffens.{/n} "No. No, I took no pleasure or joy in it. I... acted as any agent of the Golden Throne should when faced with an obstacle in his path. I acted like Calcazar. I'm not proud of it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希绷紧了脸。{/n}“不，我并没有因此感到满意或喜悦。我……当我面对道路上的阻碍时，我的做法与黄金王座其他的代理人别无二致。我与卡尔卡扎做了类似的事情，我并不以此为荣。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stiffens.{/n} "No. No, I took no pleasure or joy in it. I... acted as any agent of the Golden Throne should when faced with an obstacle in his path. I acted like Calcazar. I'm not proud of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希绷紧了脸。{/n}“不，我并没有因此感到满意或喜悦。我……当我面对道路上的阻碍时，我的做法与黄金王座其他的代理人别无二致。我与卡尔卡扎做了类似的事情，我并不以此为荣。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se queda rígido.{/n} «No. No, estoy nada satisfecho. No he sentido ningún placer ni alegría. Me... he comportado como cualquier otro agente del Trono Dorado ante un obstáculo. Me he comportado como Calcazar. No estoy orgulloso de ello».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stiffens.{/n} "No. No, I took no pleasure or joy in it. I... acted as any agent of the Golden Throne should when faced with an obstacle in his path. I acted like Calcazar. I'm not proud of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se queda rígido.{/n} «No. No, estoy nada satisfecho. No he sentido ningún placer ni alegría. Me... he comportado como cualquier otro agente del Trono Dorado ante un obstáculo. Me he comportado como Calcazar. No estoy orgulloso de ello».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはかたまる。{/n}「いや、喜びも楽しみもなかった。俺は…「黄金の玉座」のエージェントとして、行く手を阻む障害に直面したときにとるべき行動をとった。俺はカルカサルのように行動した。誇れることではない」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stiffens.{/n} "No. No, I took no pleasure or joy in it. I... acted as any agent of the Golden Throne should when faced with an obstacle in his path. I acted like Calcazar. I'm not proud of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはかたまる。{/n}「いや、喜びも楽しみもなかった。俺は…「黄金の玉座」のエージェントとして、行く手を阻む障害に直面したときにとるべき行動をとった。俺はカルカサルのように行動した。誇れることではない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se raidit{/n}. « Non. Non, je n'en ai tiré aucun plaisir. J'ai... agi comme l'aurait fait n'importe quel autre agent du Trône d'Or face à un obstacle. J'ai agi comme Calcazar, mais je n'en suis pas fier. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stiffens.{/n} "No. No, I took no pleasure or joy in it. I... acted as any agent of the Golden Throne should when faced with an obstacle in his path. I acted like Calcazar. I'm not proud of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se raidit{/n}. « Non. Non, je n'en ai tiré aucun plaisir. J'ai... agi comme l'aurait fait n'importe quel autre agent du Trône d'Or face à un obstacle. J'ai agi comme Calcazar, mais je n'en suis pas fier. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix erstarrt.{/n} "Nein. Nein, ich hatte weder Spaß noch Freude daran. Ich ... habe so gehandelt, wie es jeder Agent des Goldenen Throns tun sollte, wenn sich ihm ein Hindernis in den Weg stellt. Ich habe gehandelt wie Calcazar. Darauf bin ich nicht stolz."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stiffens.{/n} "No. No, I took no pleasure or joy in it. I... acted as any agent of the Golden Throne should when faced with an obstacle in his path. I acted like Calcazar. I'm not proud of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix erstarrt.{/n} "Nein. Nein, ich hatte weder Spaß noch Freude daran. Ich ... habe so gehandelt, wie es jeder Agent des Goldenen Throns tun sollte, wenn sich ihm ein Hindernis in den Weg stellt. Ich habe gehandelt wie Calcazar. Darauf bin ich nicht stolz."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix kaskatı kesiliyor.{/n} "Hayır. Bu beni ne memnun ne de mutlu etti. Ben... Altın Taht'ın bir ajanının, yoluna çıkan bir engel karşısında ne yapmam gerekiyorsa onu yaptım. Calcazar gibi davrandım. Bundan gurur duymuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stiffens.{/n} "No. No, I took no pleasure or joy in it. I... acted as any agent of the Golden Throne should when faced with an obstacle in his path. I acted like Calcazar. I'm not proud of it."
